hero.headline: Powerful interfaces with React + TypeScript
hero.subheadline: I'm learning component structure, type safety, and modern design principles through a static foundation.

about.title: ABOUT
about.tagline: My journey to becoming a modern web developer
about.description: I'm a developer who's new to frontend but values design and user experience highly. I aim to understand component logic with React and TypeScript and build reusable structures.
